original_text:
How much you go about,
    changing your way!
You shall be put to shame by Egypt
    as you were put to shame by Assyria.
korean_text: 네가 어찌하여 네 길을 바꾸어 부지런히 돌아다니느냐 네가 앗수르로 말미암아 수치를 당함 같이 또한 애굽으로 말미암아 수치를 당할 것이라

sentences.original_text: You shall be put to shame by Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 애굽 때문에 부끄러움을 당할 것이다

sentences.original_text: as you were put to shame by Assyria
